Hello Everyone, 

 

Thank you again for joining last week’s Live with Excom- your engagement and questions truly contributed to an impactful conversation. 

 

What did you think of the new format? Please take a minute and let us know here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1366&user=10155> .

In case you missed it this time, you can rewatch the videos and full session here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1367&user=10155> .


Have a great week ahead & stay connected,

The Internal Comms Team
